value:
I had hoped to meet some interesting
people here, but these Heroes are all
way too formal for me.

I had some very nice dinners with
Lewyn back in Silesse. I hope he'll
play his lyre for me so I can dance!

It's so gloomy in here! Stop your
brooding and let's go have some fun!

Oh, did you want to see me dance?
I've noticed you watching. You know
talent when you see it!

I was praying...praying for all of the
people swept up by war, praying for
their suffering to be eased.

Hi there! I'm Silvia. Here's a note
from $Nf!$k$pI think they miss you! Why not stop
by for a visit sometime soon?

My form is as fine as can be... Now,
to share this energy with the entire
army!

Could I be...average? Am I losing my
edge?
You can tell I skipped practice? Sorry!

This adds to my charms, don't you
think?

I am the blossoming flower of the
battlefield—the traveling dancer,
Silvia! "Silvi" works too.

Don't you get tired of thinking so
much, $Nu?$k$pJust looking at you gives me a
headache. What's going on in there?$k$pI used to know a priest...and you're
just like him. His face would wrinkle
up, and he'd groan and groan...$k$pAren't you lucky, though? Because...$k$pDa-da-da-dah! I'm here with you!$k$pEven with all the troubles you carry
around... I can dance for you. You
have me to help you relax.$k$pI'll help you with your stamina,
because if you don't have energy,
everybody here is in trouble!$k$pWhenever you need me, just say the
word!
はいっ！
Yah!
Aahhh!
No way!
This is going to get rough!
I have no rival!
Blossom of the battlefield!
My petals are sharp!
Why me?
Hey!
How about a dance? That'll cheer you up!
Come on, show me a smile!
Are you kidding? Of course this isn't underwear. This is how dancers dress!
No, I'm not chilly. I'm burning up! My heart is aflame with passion!
There's something about you... I can't quite put my finger on it.
Take another look. There's more to me than you seem to think!
Now, pay attention. I'm going to show you a special dance. I'm a little bit nervous, but here we go.
Sure thing!
I love to dance!
Ready to move!
